content: Optimal transport group @ Uni Goettingen Optimal transport group Home - Team - Publications - Teaching - Software - Open positions Welcome Optimal transport group We work on convex analysis, optimal transport, and numerical optimization applied to machine learning for biomedical images and dynamical systems and the corresponding theoretical foundations.
